duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a functional liaison between project managers, key customer contacts, and end users to understand business processes and facilitate the delivery of Blue Yonder, Inc. solutions within the Category Management suite.
Mentor junior team members and customers on solution optimization, business processes, and internal BY initiatives.
Provide advice to customers on industry best practices, process methodology, and become a trusted advisor to the customer.
Create and modify procedural and system documentation outlining business requirements, gaps, solutions, and testing scripts throughout the project.
Conduct high level and detailed design sessions, leading to writing solution design documentation and functional specifications, and building use cases for validation of business requirements.
Complete BY Category Management certifications for the current releases of the products.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Engineering, or Science preferred
